keyPolicies.policyDescription: Labour will secure the future of our NHS, raising over £2.5bn from tobacco company profits and a levy on properties worth over £2million, to fund more frontline staff.
From reducing tuition fees for students, to providing more apprenticeships and building affordable homes, Labour will deliver for our young people.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: FAIR PAY FOR A FAIR DAY'S WORK
keyPolicies.policyDescription: A Labour Government will tackle low pay and zero-hours contracts, helping to make work pay.
Labour will reduce the deficit in a fairer way, by growing our economy and protecting vital public services.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: A FULL-TIME MP FOR EAST DEVON
keyPolicies.policyDescription: I pledge to be a full-time MP for East Devon, and will vote to ban MPs from holding lucrative directorships and consultancies.

issues.economy: Labour will reduce the deficit in a fairer way, by growing our economy and protecting vital public services.

images.caption: STEVE RACE was in your area today
